message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"not correct; wrong","sentence":"这个不对。","image_prompt":"A young child points at a book with an X mark on the page, showing confusion. An atmosphere of calm persists, with soft lighting and subtle hints of plants peeking through cracks. Animation style: soft apocalypse, warm tones, simple shapes, clear expression of 'wrong' or 'incorrect.'","sentence_translation":"This is not correct."}
